description: This adapter mounts on top of any RMR mount, enabling installation of a compatible Holosun red dot sight -- namely, 507K -- instead.
A low Micro-series mount for compatible Aimpoint red dot sights: T-1 and T-2.  Installs on top of a common Picatinny rail, found on most large modern firearms.
A fairly-large mount for installing a popular Trijicon ACOG sight onto any common Picatinny rail.

description: A specialized mount allowing one to install a popular Trijicon RMR red dot sight on top of an equally-popular Trijicon ACOG TA01 sight.  This enables usage of different sights for different distances, potentially making aiming quicker and more precise overall.
